title: Rumors Motivate Central American Kids To Set Out For U.S. Border
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to Eric Olson of the Woodrow Wilson Center and Alfredo Corchado of the Dallas Morning News, who's in Honduras, about what's driving the influx of young illegal migrants.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
